publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-3735 Caulders Garden Centre, Best Garden Centre in Scotland (lodged on 18 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Cathie Craigie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3735 David Whitton: Caulders Garden Centre, Best Garden Centre in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Caulders Garden Centre in Kirkintilloch on being named the Best Garden Centre in Scotland by the UK Garden Centre Association; notes that Caulders was highly commended for customer service, range of display of plants and quality of staff, and also notes that, even in these tough economic times, valued local businesses are continuing to invest in and promote their local areas by providing good customer service and training to staff. Supported by: Robin Harper, Claire Baker, David Stewart, Helen Eadie, Ross Finnie, Des McNulty, Stuart McMillan, Trish Godman, Bill Kidd, Mr Frank McAveety, Jamie Hepburn, Cathie Craigie, Sandra White, Christopher Harvie*
